title: Unit 2: The Forecast is "Always" wrong, Video 4: Common Forecasting Process Inherently Flawed

media:group.media:title: Unit 2: The Forecast is "Always" wrong, Video 4: Common Forecasting Process Inherently Flawed
media:group.media:description:
"MIT IDS.333 Risk and Decision Analysis, Fall 2021
Instructor: run the forecasts 'off the road''
View the complete course: https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/ids-333-risk-and-decision-analysis-fall-2021/
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP62jwhTqp8_1kwrkDkxZhpQC

Common forecasting processes in great part project past trends into the future. This approach inherently fails to deal with the inevitable political, economic, and technological 'game changers.''
